game.name: Mr Gun
game.description:
What you want to be a legend, a spy or a hero? Join this unique shooting phenomenon and get ready to enjoy an awesome gaming experience no matter what character skin you want to wear! Do not need to take your enemies easily as they can either be ninjas or any other bad guys you have not imagined ever. You need a laser focus and precise aim to finish all your enemies in all levels in Mr. Gun. This brand new action game will take you to new lands where perfect aiming at your enemies can save you. 
Remember all the parties whether it is you or your enemies will have only 1 chance to shoot. So think twice before releasing the bullet to take down your enemies. Do not forget to upgrade your weapons like grenade launchers to face off your rivals with more confidence in this html5 shooting game. You can meet the dangerous enemies around every corner. So try to be the most terrifying nightmare of your rivals by wearing a killer look. The deadly combination of shotguns and rifles will be there along with you to see in the eyes of the danger confidently. 
Kill every bad gay you see on your way and finish each level without losing your life in this platformer shooter! Climbing every new stair will introduce you to a new opponent. So do not take rest until you destroy all the bad guys to complete all 20 levels. You can track your progress level by looking at the top of the screen. Level boss will also be appeared on the screen once you destroy all your enemies and are ready to fill the bar. Complete levels to grab money through which you can buy new weapons from the in-game shop!
